hypothesis_content.title: Multi-Timeframe RSI Divergence Reversion
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC shows bearish RSI divergence on the daily chart (price makes higher high, RSI makes lower high) while the 4-hour RSI is oversold (< 35), price will revert downward to close the divergence within 5 trading days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Multi-timeframe divergences between momentum and price often resolve in favor of the longer timeframe momentum reading. Oversold conditions on lower timeframes within a larger bearish divergence create high-probability mean reversion setups.
entry_conditions: BTC Daily: Price HH, RSI LH (bearish divergence)
BTC 4H RSI(14) < 35 at time of daily close
Divergence represents at least 3% price appreciation with RSI declining

exit_conditions.take_profit: Price declines to eliminate divergence (return to previous swing low area)
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price breaks above divergence high by > 1%
exit_conditions.time_exit: 5 trading days (120 hours) after signal confirmation

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Divergence resolves upward (price continues higher) in > 40% of cases OR reversion takes longer than 5 days in > 60% of occurrences.
